FIX.detailed_description: Setting this to 'yes' starts the FIX CTCI gateway used for order routing. The default is 'no'.

IbLoginId.detailed_description: Your TWS username, used for logging into Trader Workstation or IB Gateway.

IbPassword.detailed_description: Your TWS password, used for secure authentication to the Trader Workstation or IB Gateway.

FIXLoginId.detailed_description: This field is for the username required for logging into the FIX CTCI gateway, if applicable.

FIXPassword.detailed_description: The password for logging into the FIX CTCI gateway, used for secure authentication.

SecondFactorDevice.detailed_description: Specifies the second factor device to be used if multiple devices are enabled for your account.

ReloginAfterSecondFactorAuthenticationTi.description: Retry login after second factor timeout.
ReloginAfterSecondFactorAuthenticationTi.detailed_description: Automatically retries login if second factor authentication times out. Default is 'no'.

SecondFactorAuthenticationTimeout.detailed_description: The number of seconds before the second factor authentication process times out. Default is 180 seconds.

ExitAfterSecondFactorAuthenticationTimeo.description: Exit after second factor authentication timeout.
ExitAfterSecondFactorAuthenticationTimeo.detailed_description: Deprecated setting. Determines whether IBC should exit after failing second factor authentication.

TradingMode.detailed_description: Indicates whether to use the 'live' or 'paper' trading mode. Default is 'live', meaning real trading.

AcceptNonBrokerageAccountWarning.detailed_description: Automatically confirms the warning displayed when logging into a paper-trading account. Default is 'no'.

LoginDialogDisplayTimeout.description: Login dialog display timeout in seconds.
LoginDialogDisplayTimeout.detailed_description: Controls how long (in seconds) IBC waits for the TWS login dialog to appear before restarting TWS. Default is 60 seconds.

IbDir.detailed_description: Path to the directory where TWS should store its settings. Typically this is the installation folder, but it can be customized.

StoreSettingsOnServer.description: Store TWS settings on IB's server.
StoreSettingsOnServer.detailed_description: Allows TWS settings to be stored on Interactive Brokers' servers for consistency across multiple devices.

MinimizeMainWindow.description: Minimize TWS main window on startup.
MinimizeMainWindow.detailed_description: If set to 'yes', TWS will minimize its main window upon startup. Default is 'no'.

ExistingSessionDetectedAction.description: Action to take when an existing session is detected.
ExistingSessionDetectedAction.detailed_description: Specifies what TWS should do if an existing session is already logged in. Options are 'manual', 'primary', 'primaryoverride', and 'secondary'. Default is 'manual'.

OverrideTwsApiPort.detailed_description: Changes the socket port in TWS's API configuration at runtime, only for advanced users. Leave empty to retain the current setting.

OverrideTwsMasterClientID.detailed_description: Sets the Master Client ID in TWS API configuration. This setting is usually not required.

ReadOnlyLogin.detailed_description: Automatically logs into TWS in read-only mode, where placing or managing orders is not allowed. Default is 'yes'.

ReadOnlyApi.detailed_description: When enabled, API programs cannot submit, modify, or cancel orders. Default is 'yes'.

DismissPasswordExpiryWarning.detailed_description: When set to 'yes', TWS will automatically dismiss the password expiry warning. Default is 'no'.

DismissNSEComplianceNotice.detailed_description: Automatically dismisses the NSE Compliance Notice for Indian versions of TWS. Default is 'yes'.

CommandServerPort.detailed_description: The port on which the IBC command server listens for commands. Default is 0, which disables the command server.

ControlFrom.detailed_description: Comma-separated list of IP addresses allowed to send commands to IBC. Default allows commands from the local host.

LogStructureScope.detailed_description: Defines which TWS windows are eligible for structure logging. Options are 'known', 'unknown', 'untitled', or 'all'. Default is 'known'.

LogStructureWhen.detailed_description: Specifies the circumstances under which window structure is logged. Options are 'open', 'openclose', 'activate', and 'never'. Default is 'never'.
